tourist boat capsizes during a thunderst: A tourist boat, the Wonder Sea, capsized during a sudden thunderstorm in Ha Long Bay, Vietnam, on Saturday, resulting in the deaths of 34 people. The boat was carrying 53 individuals—48 passengers and five crew members—on a sightseeing tour. Rescue operations saved 12 people, but seven remain missing. The incident occurred as Storm Wipha approached, causing severe weather in the area. Children were among the victims of this tragedy.
